headline.main: Story Approval by Drug Lord? Times Editors Discuss Rolling Stone Case

snippet: Sean Penn’s interview with the drug kingpin El Chapo was a “great get” of a story, but Times editors would have walked away from the interview, they say.
abstract: Sean Penn’s interview with the drug kingpin El Chapo was a “great get” of a story, but Times editors would have walked away from the interview, they say.
